title: BRIEF-Zymeworks Announces New Chair Of Board Of Directors And Voluntary Delisting From The TSX
text:
© Reuters. BRIEF-Zymeworks Announces New Chair Of Board Of Directors And Voluntary Delisting From The TSX

Sept 17 (Reuters) - Zymeworks Inc :

* ZYMEWORKS ANNOUNCES NEW CHAIR OF BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND VOLUNTARY DELISTING FROM THE TSX

* ZYMEWORKS INC - LOTA ZOTH HAS BEEN APPOINTED AS ITS CHAIR OF BOARD OF DIRECTORS

* ZYMEWORKS INC - ZOTH SUCCEEDS NICK BEDFORD, WHO HAS RETIRED FROM HIS FUNCTIONS AS CHAIR AND BOARD MEMBER

* ZYMEWORKS - MADE STRATEGIC DECISION TO VOLUNTARILY DELIST COMMON SHARES FROM TORONTO STOCK EXCHANGE IN CANADA

* ZYMEWORKS INC - VOLUNTARY DELISTING CURRENTLY ANTICIPATED TO OCCUR ON OR AROUND OCTOBER 1, 2019.

* ZYMEWORKS - CO'S SHARES TO CONTINUE TO BE TRADED ON NYSE UNDER SYMBOL "ZYME"
description: BRIEF-Zymeworks Announces New Chair Of Board Of Directors And Voluntary Delisting From The TSX
